message: Just looking over the docs and noticed there was no support for oauth support for api access. I dont really want to store user credentials in my app. Any idea if this is coming soon?
"soon" will be subjective. @ericflo stated in a recent topic that it's on the roadmap.
@ptone By subjective, do you mean that from @ericflo's own perspective he will arrive sooner than he does to an outside observer?
@ptone +1 for soon. API best practices and all that.

@zenbat just meant that for @rays, a delivery date for the feature may or may not be what he considers "soon" - would be more explicit to ask, is this coming within the next three months.  All I'm saying is that it is on their radar.
